kv9.3:1.3: Atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:1.5: nanu natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:1.7: Hañci natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.3:2.1: Phasso sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:2.3: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:3.2: saññā cetanā cittaṁ saddhā vīriyaṁ sati samādhi paññā rāgo doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ …pe…
kv9.3:3.3: anottappaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:3.5: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:4.1: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:4.3: Phasso sārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:5.1: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:5.4: anottappaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:6.6: Hañci rūpaṁ sappaccayaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
